mapper.select: /* getDicKeywordsListAll */ select idx, type, keyword, ratio, regdate, regid from dic_keywords order by type asc, ratio desc
select type from dic_keywords group by type
/* countDicKeywords */ select count(*) from dic_keywords where keyword = #{keyword}
mapper.insert: /* intDicNotMapKeywords */ insert into dic_notmap_keywords (type, keyword, ratio, regdate, regid) values (#{type}, #{keyword}, #{ratio} , now(), #{regid}) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE regdate = now()
mapper.select: /* getDicNotMapKeywords */ select type,keyword,ratio,regdate,regid FROM dic_notmap_keywords order by regdate desc

/* cntTagsMetasByDicKeywordsAndGenre */ select count(*) as cnt, itm.mtype as type from items_tags_metas itm inner join items_tags_keys itk on itk.idx = itm.idx and itk.tagidx = itm.tagidx and itk.stat = 'S' inner join items_metas im on im.idx = itm.idx and im.mtype = 'genre' and im.meta like concat('%',#{genre},'%') where itm.mtype like 'METAS%' and itm.meta like concat('%"',#{keyword},'",%') group by itm.mtype;
mapper.insert: /* insDicRankWords2 */ insert into dic_rank_words2(genre, mtype, keyword, freq2, regdate) values (#{genre}, #{type}, #{keyword}, #{cnt}, now()) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE freq2 = #{cnt}, regdate = now()

/* insDicSubgenreGenres */ insert into dic_subgenre_genres (mtype, genre, meta, regid, regdate) values (#{mtype}, #{genre}, #{meta}, #{regid}, now()) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE genre = #{genre}, meta = #{meta}, regid = #{regid}, regdate = now()
mapper.select: /* getAllDicSubgenreGenres */ select distinct meta from dic_subgenre_genres order by meta
mapper.insert: LOAD DATA LOCAL INFILE #{filePath} ignore INTO TABLE `metatagdb`.`dic_keywords` COLUMNS TERMINATED BY ',' OPTIONALLY ENCLOSED BY '"' LINES TERMINATED BY '\n' IGNORE 1 LINES (@col1,@col2) set type=@col1, keyword=@col2, ratio=0, regdate=now(), regid='sched', freq1 = 0, procdate=now()
mapper.select: /* get10DicKeywordsList 자동검색 */ select a.idx, a.type, a.keyword, a.ratio, a.regdate, a.regid from ( select idx, type, keyword, ratio, regdate, regid from dic_keywords where type = #{type} and keyword like concat(#{keyword},'%') union all select idx, type, keyword, ratio, regdate, regid from dic_keywords where type = #{type} and keyword like concat('%',#{keyword},'%') and keyword not like concat(#{keyword},'%') )a limit #{pageSize}
